snippet: If democratic leaders had seized the chance to get Russia out of World War I, Lenin, Stalin, even Hitler would have been footnotes in history....

headline.main: As US Aid and Influence Shrinks in Pakistan, China Steps In
headline.print_headline: As US Aid and Influence Shrinks in Pakistan, China Steps In

lead_paragraph: If democratic leaders had seized the chance to get Russia out of World War I, Lenin, Stalin, even Hitler would have been footnotes in history.
